newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore bunkers steady, market lacks direction.
newsitem.headline: Singapore bunkers steady, market lacks direction.

text.p: Singapore bunker indications were little changed on Thursday amid very thin discussions as traders looked to the cargo market for a price direction, brokers said.
Bunker 380-cst prices were quoted at $118-$119 per tonne while 180-cst prices were at $123-$124 per tonne.

A shipowner said he plans to cover a small 2,000 tonne parcel requirement in Singapore later on Wednesday but said he would look to the cargo market for a clearer price direction before making his purchase.
MDO prices were stable at $223-228 and gas oil at $234-$238. -- Singapore Newsroom (+65-870-3082)
